content:
Certainly! Here's an updated description that includes the information about the non-profits:

At our revolutionary t-shirt brand, we're not just committed to providing unique and sustainable fashion for men, women, and children - we're also dedicated to giving back to our community. That's why we donate 5% of our proceeds to two non-profit organizations: Stockton Shelter for the Homeless and Gulisi Community Primary School.

Stockton Shelter for the Homeless (SSH) offers healthcare and support to homeless veterans, providing them with financial assistance, housing, and other essential services. Your purchase helps to support these efforts and make a difference in the lives of our nation's veterans.

Gulisi Community Primary School, located in Dangriga, Belize, is an elementary school that helps students with scholarships to continue their education. By supporting our brand, you're also supporting the education and growth of children in our global community.

With our commitment to sustainability, style, and social responsibility, our brand is more than just a fashion statement - it's a movement. Stay tuned for exciting updates and new releases from our brand, and join us in making a difference in the world.
